summary: This bill, the Restore Department of Veterans Affairs Accountability Act of 2025, aims to reform disciplinary procedures within the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA). It introduces stricter disciplinary measures for supervisors and managers based on performance and misconduct, including removal, demotion, or suspension. It also modifies existing procedures for VA employees, potentially overriding collective bargaining agreements. The bill emphasizes stricter timelines for disciplinary actions and limits the scope of judicial and administrative reviews regarding penalties.
